title: Wes Gauthier is riding shotgun this week
text: Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Wes Gauthier is riding shotgun this week This week Wes Gauthier of Strawn's rides shotgun with Roy and the two get down and dirty with their opinions on Leonard Fournette should be allowed to go to the NFL early. Are the Cowboys done? And more!
